content: part 1-13 are online thanks for participating mystery kal the blanket is called knit&purl blanket and will have 13 different parts with only knit & purl combinations it is suitable for a beginner as you only need to know how to cast on knit purl and cast off the pattern is written in english and dutch but there will be pictures and charts so i believe it is possible for anyone to do it there is also a facebook group wollyhood knit-a-long 1 where you can ask for help or translations material approx 750-800m of any yarn suitable for needle size 4-5mm i e drops puna karisma lima or merino extra fine 5mm knitting needles tapestry needle if you would like to make a bigger longer blanket there are a few patterns that can be knitted longer or that can be repeated again later there is a total amount of 8 patterns that are easily adjusted in height we have included instructions to make blankets that are approx 80cm / 100cm / 120cm wide 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1467066693531879/
